body: @HopelessAdm "isn't that partly dirt and other residue stuck inside the foreskin??" Yep and the fact he even had any means he probably hadn't washed himself for a couple of days. Doesn't really matter since this is fiction but it's still nasty.

Consented smex with little Santa is a promising situation, but the smegma part is a bit weird (isn't that partly dirt and other residue stuck inside the foreskin??). And the number 13 made me consider the possibility of Santa having smex with 12 other guys before him (STD intensifies 😭)
Hmm very interesting hentai with a cute loli Santa but the smegma part really put me off.
Nympho santa is an interesting concept but that ending though xD
